revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=DSL-N12U |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B006N51T88;GB;,B00AAVW7G4;GB; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/03/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RTA7155W |manuf_rev=-D61 |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=MSQDSLN12U |ic_id=3568A-DSLN12U |us_id=ASUDL01BDSLN12U |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052;RT3052F; |cpu1_cspeed=384 |cpu2_brand=TrendChip |cpu2_model=TC3162LEM;TC3162LE, LQ128G; |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=M25P128 |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=M25P80 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6JH-6 |ram2=2 |ram2_brand=Winbond |ram2_model=W9816G6IH-6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=DSL AFE;TrendChip;TC3086;;1;QFN64;EPG; |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=F4:6D:04 |oui_eth=F4:6D:04 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N300 ADSL Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.asus.com/Networking/DSLN12U/}} (''A1''){{•}} {{ProductPage|http://www.asus.com/Networking/DSLN12U_B1/}} (''B1'') ''ASUS'''s firmware seems to indicate this device is [[Ralink]]/[[TrendChip]] based.. "RTA7155W-D61" … is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The TrendChip ADSL SoC is probably a TC3162LE. Per the manual, the default SSID is ''ASUS''. {{see also|ASUS|Askey}} ===Additional specifications=== per ''ASUS'''s product page * ''Memory'': :8MB Flash/32MB SDRAM for Wi-Fi :1MB Flash/2MB SDRAM for ADSL * ''Antenna'': 2x Fixed 5dBi antenna * ''Ports'': 1x RJ11 for xDSL :4x RJ45 10/100 BaseT for LAN *''USB Ports'': 1x USB 2.0 * ''Power Adapter'': :AC Input : 100~240V (50/60HZ) :DC Output : 12V/1.5A *''Dimensions (W x H x D)'': [[Dimensions::179 mm x 37 mm x 119 mm]] *''Weight'': [[Weight::345 g]] ===Reviews=== * [http://foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/81-asus-dsl-n12u Review on '''FoxNetLab'''] ===Forum threads=== * [http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2662095 On '''HWupgrade'''] ===Spec. aggregators=== * [http://www.speedguide.net/routers/asus-dsl-n12u-300mbps-wireless-adsl-gateway-with-2075 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] * [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/dsl-n12u On '''OpenWrt Wiki'''] ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|bootlog |
U-Boot 1.1.3 (Mar 31 2011 - 16:03:06) 
Board: Ralink APSoC DRAM: 32 MB 
relocate_code Pointer at: 81630000 
spi_wait_nsec: 3e 
spi deice id: 20 20 18 0 0 (20180000) 
find flash: M25P128 
Using default environment 
============================================ 
Ralink UBoot Version: 3.5 (03/31/2011) 
-------------------------------------------- 
ASIC 3052F (DSL-N12U) (Port5<->None) 
DRAM component: 256 Mbits SDR 
DRAM bus: 16 bit 
Total memory: 32 MBytes 
Flash component: SPI Flash 
Date:Mar 31 2011 Time:16:03:06 
============================================ 
icache: sets:256, ways:4, linesz:32 ,total:32768 
dcache: sets:128, ways:4, linesz:32 ,total:16384 

   ##### The CPU freq = 384 MHZ ####
}} ==Images== File:DSL-N12U 1.jpg|front File:DSL-N12U 2.jpg|angled File:DSL-N12U 3.jpg|back File:DSL-N12U 4.jpg|box File:DSL-N12U 5.jpg|angled [[Has images::external| ]] __NOTOC__
